name: Corona Bangladesh Live
author: Amdadul Haq

sections.description:
This plugin is very easy to use & eay catching design. you will be able to use is without any configuration. just add a widget to any sidebar. You can also use it by shortcode.
There are three shortcode here. Here are Example of shortcode. ‘[cbdl_widget_1]’, ‘[cbdl_widget_2]’ & ‘[cbdl_widget_3]’. Thanks for using this plugin.

If this any modification require and if you face any problem please contact with us : https://m.me/ekotahost

CURRENT API INFOMATION

API

We have used another API which is “covid19api – A free API for data on the Coronavirus”.
Access data on COVID19 through an easy API for free. Build dashboards, mobile apps or integrate in to other applications. Data is sourced from Johns Hopkins CSSE. Built by Kyle Redelinghuys.

API: http://covid19tracker.gov.bd

API: https://api.covid19api.com/summary

Endpoint: https://covid19api.com

Privacy policy: https://covid19api.com/privacy-policy.html

  • Please Donate us to Support this plugin.
sections.installation:
This plugin full installation given bellow

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/covid-19-bd-live directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance->Widget & see the name of Corona Related Widget.
  4. Now just drag & drop any sidebar & you have just done the activiction process.
sections.faq:
This plugin show data only Bangladesh?

No. You will get Bangladesh & The whole world update.

What i get from this plugin?

You will get Bangladesh all update of Coronavirous.

short_description: Corona Bangladesh Live is a plugin where you can get all update of Bangladesh & all over the world.
